name: Endpoint
title: Endpoint
description: The technical details of an endpoint that can be used for electronic services, such as for web services providing XDS.b or a REST endpoint for another FHIR server. This may include any security context information.

elements.name: Endpoint
elements.description: The technical details of an endpoint that can be used for electronic services.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifier for the organization that is used to identify the endpoint across multiple disparate systems.

elements.name: connectionType
elements.description: A coded value that represents the technical details of the usage of this endpoint, such as what WSDLs should be used in what way.

elements.name: name
elements.description: A friendly name that this endpoint can be referred to with.

elements.name: managingOrganization
elements.description: The organization that manages this endpoint (even if technically another organization is hosting this in the cloud, it is the organization associated with the data).

elements.name: contact
elements.description: Contact details for a human to contact about the subscription.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The interval during which the endpoint is expected to be operational.

elements.name: payloadType
elements.description: The payload type describes the acceptable content that can be communicated on the endpoint.

elements.name: payloadMimeType
elements.description: The mime type to send the payload in - e.g. application/fhir+xml, application/fhir+json.

elements.name: address
elements.description: The uri that describes the actual end-point to connect to.

elements.name: header
elements.description: Additional headers / information to send as part of the notification.
